scripts.build: echo 'Building utils with pnpm...' && sleep 2 && echo 'utils build complete!'
scripts.dev: echo 'Starting utils dev server with pnpm...' && while true; do echo '[utils] Dev server running...'; sleep 5; done
scripts.test: echo 'Running utils tests with pnpm...' && sleep 1 && echo 'utils tests passed!'
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting utils with pnpm...' && sleep 1 && echo 'utils linting complete!'
